revised_title: The Theory of Electronic Semi-Conductors and Insulators
tldr: The author discusses the application of quantum mechanics to the problem of metallic conduction and electronic semi-conductors. They explain how all electrons in a metal are free, and how the difference between good and bad conductors is due to the effect of impurities and temperature. The author also presents a model of a lattice to show how insulators and semi-conductors can be explained using quantum mechanics.
